Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Even though i am not known very well (at least i think so), I will be moving this summer (june 23) but my father is wanting to take down all computers and TVs except for one TV this weekend if he has his way. Then after we get to where we are moving I will be going off to basic for the United States Air Force. So I will be gone for a while. So to all I thank you for cheering me up whenever i was down, and giving me some really great ideas. With that i may be sporadically off and on with wi-fi on my ipod but I would not expect much. I wish you all good luck on any future adventures and endeavors.

Im The One
Seeya mate, have a good time, and hope you do good in your Basic Training. Godspeed to you and your family.

Ten-Hut!

\*salutes\*

Goodbye, friend. You will be missed. Come back soon with improvements for the Aero model!

> 
> Have fun forcing the air.

You shouldn't force the air to do anything it doesn't want to do, otherwise it will screw you up. badly. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Wishing you all the best on the journey you're about to undertake... thank you for your service... do great things. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Thank you, and good luck!

Have fun up there.
